name: Punch Rhythm Fever!
description:
Made for LOWREZJAM 2021.
It's a rhythm game inspired by Rhythm Tengoku. It was made with a 64x64 resolution, and it's scaled up to 8 times.
Art & music made by: le milhouse

Use <spacebar> to punch in time to the rhythm.
You can use <up/down arrow keys> to turn the volume up/down
You can press <T> to hide/show rating during the music.

It's my first rhythm game, hope you like :)

There are "bad", "ok", "good", "great" and "perfect" ratings. Post down what you got and give your thoughts on the difficulty level.

* maybe the music gets unsynchronized, if this happens try refreshing.
